channel.title: I need a little help with this
channel.description:
ok well there's 2 things i want to do with my server right now, but i can't seem to find out how to do it.
first thing is to make people keep all of their items when they die, (if possible, only when killed by another player) (this is because im sick of people b****ing about looters :P) i've tried do delete all of the deleteitems from the applydead and the youdied voids in client.java
second thing i want to do is to make certain weapons and armor only equipable by a certain player right. for example: a weapon intended for the admins would only be equipable for people who have admin priveleges or higher, but not lower. i have no idea where to start with this, so i havent tried anything yet. can anyone help?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 20, 2008, 05:38:18 PM[/size][hr]come on i really need to know

item.title: I need a little help with this
item.dc:creator: @ill4ev ill4ev
item.description:
@ill4ev wrote:

ok well there’s 2 things i want to do with my server right now, but i can’t seem to find out how to do it.

first thing is to make people keep all of their items when they die, (if possible, only when killed by another player)
(this is because im sick of people b****ing about looters :P)
i’ve tried do delete all of the deleteitems from the applydead and the youdied voids in client.java

second thing i want to do is to make certain weapons and armor only equipable by a certain player right. for example: a weapon intended for the admins would only be equipable for people who have admin priveleges or higher, but not lower.
i have no idea where to start with this, so i havent tried anything yet. can anyone help?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 20, 2008, 05:38:18 PM[/size][hr]come on i really need to know
